data.name: Restaurant Renovator
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1263620/Yacht_Mechanic_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1905980/Farmers_Father/[/url] [url]https://store.steampowered.com/app/1411740/Urbek_City_Builder/[/url]


About the Game

[url]https://store.steampowered.com/app/1244630/House_Builder/[/url] https://store.steampowered.com/app/1430760/Aquarist__build_aquariums_grow_fish_develop_your_business/ Starving for some challenge? Starting with just a few dollars in your pocket, conquer the world of gastronomy! Become a Restaurant Renovator, famous guru who helps failing restaurants rise from their knees. [u][b]KEY FEATURES:[/b][/u] [h2]GO BANANAS![/h2] [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1057630/extras/RR-1.gif?t=1658915071[/img] Create a brand new venue! You can tear down the walls and get rid of the floors, destroy, rebuild, redecorate to make a place of your dreams and get the best reviews! Remember, your actions and decisions will influence the final score... [h2]LET THEM SPILL THE BEANS![/h2] [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1057630/extras/RR2.gif?t=1658915071[/img] Another restaurant is in the pickle? Let's help them! Begin by asking local people and learn about their needs and favourite flavors. Discovering neighbourhood can truly help you to prepare the right recipe for the success. [h2](NOT AS) EASY AS PIE[/h2] [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1057630/extras/R3.gif?t=1658915071[/img] Creating a new menu can be pretty hard. You'd have to not only be creative and show your imagination but also get the recipes and tools you need to make the meals of your dreams. You have to be a tough cookie to face up this challenge! [h2]HAVE A CAKE AND EAT IT TOO...[/h2] [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1057630/extras/R4.gif?t=1658915071[/img] Invest in your business and let your Renovator's empire grow. Every good review will influence your prestige and bring you closer to becoming the best Restaurant Renovator in town! [url=https://discord.com/invite/jQnsk3AhJ7][img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1057630/extras/banner_discord_GamePlanet.png?t=1658915071[/img][/url
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1411740/Urbek_City_Builder/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1244630/House_Builder/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1430760/Aquarist__build_aquariums_grow_fish_develop_your_business/

Starving for some challenge? Starting with just a few dollars in your pocket, conquer the world of gastronomy! Become a Restaurant Renovator, famous guru who helps failing restaurants rise from their knees.

KEY FEATURES:

GO BANANAS!




Create a brand new venue! You can tear down the walls and get rid of the floors, destroy, rebuild, redecorate to make a place of your dreams and get the best reviews! Remember, your actions and decisions will influence the final score...

LET THEM SPILL THE BEANS!




Another restaurant is in the pickle? Let's help them! Begin by asking local people and learn about their needs and favourite flavors. Discovering neighbourhood can truly help you to prepare the right recipe for the success.

(NOT AS) EASY AS PIE




Creating a new menu can be pretty hard. You'd have to not only be creative and show your imagination but also get the recipes and tools you need to make the meals of your dreams. You have to be a tough cookie to face up this challenge!

HAVE A CAKE AND EAT IT TOO...




Invest in your business and let your Renovator's empire grow. Every good review will influence your prestige and bring you closer to becoming the best Restaurant Renovator in town!
data.about_the_game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1244630/House_Builder/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1430760/Aquarist__build_aquariums_grow_fish_develop_your_business/

Starving for some challenge? Starting with just a few dollars in your pocket, conquer the world of gastronomy! Become a Restaurant Renovator, famous guru who helps failing restaurants rise from their knees.

KEY FEATURES:

GO BANANAS!




Create a brand new venue! You can tear down the walls and get rid of the floors, destroy, rebuild, redecorate to make a place of your dreams and get the best reviews! Remember, your actions and decisions will influence the final score...

LET THEM SPILL THE BEANS!




Another restaurant is in the pickle? Let's help them! Begin by asking local people and learn about their needs and favourite flavors. Discovering neighbourhood can truly help you to prepare the right recipe for the success.

(NOT AS) EASY AS PIE




Creating a new menu can be pretty hard. You'd have to not only be creative and show your imagination but also get the recipes and tools you need to make the meals of your dreams. You have to be a tough cookie to face up this challenge!

HAVE A CAKE AND EAT IT TOO...




Invest in your business and let your Renovator's empire grow. Every good review will influence your prestige and bring you closer to becoming the best Restaurant Renovator in town!
data.short_description: Become a Restaurant Renovator who knows the recipe for the success and helps failing restaurant to rise from their knees!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270X with 2GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Mobile GPUs are not officially supported, the game may work but we cannot guarantee it.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 Series with 4GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Mobile GPUs are not officially supported, the game may work but we cannot guarantee it.

release_date.date: Add to wishlist to get notified
